title: Maria Konnikova
description:
In this episode, Ellen sits down with Maria Konnikova. Maria is an author, producer, and has a PhD in Psychology from Columbia University. They discuss the ways that chemistry can lead us astray, her latest book The Biggest Bluff, and how to turn a bad hand into an advantage.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
